biotools.summary: determining all optimal and sub-optimal synthetic pathways that facilitate synthesis of target compounds in chassis organisms | The overaching goal of RetSynth is to streamline the arduous and complex step of selecting enzyme/reactions pairs to produce a target compound for bioengineering microbial organisms
